Since Pointy Boy season is right around the corner I figured why not a supercross test track, So without any further delay, Welcome to Session Supercross!!!
This is a fantasy track inspired by Stone riders Honda test track he made alot time ago.
I made the SX template my self, but shout out to Logan for the SX triple face.
Thanks To
– Everyone who helped test, as this was my first try at making a supercross track in two years.
– Red Rider for letting me and everyone else use your vehicle models.
– Shady, for giving me the wall ride bored so I didnt have to figure out the correct angle.
And of course Thanks to the SessionMX team!
The programs I used
– Gimp
– Blender
– Leveler

MERRY CHRISTMAS!! I wanted to give back to the community for Christmas this year, after all of the support I have received throughout the year, not just on tracks, but my Youtube and Tik Tok as well, without you guys, none of this would be possible. THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR ALL OF YOUR SUPPORT THIS YEAR!! I would like to thank SB Suki, Red Rider, Kewin Fuela, BClay, Checkerz, Qwestshun, Reaperdoc, Earthwurx, Niko, Kellz, and King MX for all of the help that they have all provided me with along the way, as well as any assets I have used provided by them! This community at its core is amazing, so lets keep it that way, and continue to grow! thank you all so much!! I hope you enjoy this Christmas Present, and I hope to participate in some races on it with you guys here soon! Have a safe, and fun holiday!

https://mxb-mods.com/sx2016-round-03-ana.title: Sx2016 Round 03 Anaheim 2
https://mxb-mods.com/sx2016-round-03-ana.creator: gdubmx
https://mxb-mods.com/sx2016-round-03-ana.description:
Description
Downloads
[b][size=4]SX2016 Round 03: Anaheim 2[/size][/b]
Continuing with the replica (1.1:1 scale) SX of the 2016 season for my third track, here is…
[img]https://i.gyazo.com/23577cbf12619d6abfd0816fb05a0317.png[/img]
I have documented the making of this track [url=http://forum.mx-bikes.com/index.php?topic=1194.0]HERE[/url].
Now this round was a bit special. I wanted to push the limits of what I was capable of doing in terms of SX, and what the game could take in its beta 4 stage. [b]Overall, it is easier to be average this round, similarly difficult to previous rounds to be fast, but there are some wicked hard and fast lines.[/b] If you “see” a section, it is probably doable. But… [i]can YOU do it?[/i]
I tried replicating the actual track and blueprint as well as possible, while making a fun track with a lot of options. Not the one lined hell that was raced (take a look at [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yPlRTpZb4nU] this go pro of the event[/url] if you want to know what hell is like). I improvised in the turn after the finish line to keep it interesting and fun. And yes, beside the quad over the table, all his lines are doable.
Compared to previous rounds:
[list][*] jump faces and landings are very slightly steeper
[*]whoops should be more forgiving, with a bigger range of minimal to maximal speed
[*]rythm section start earlier exiting turns, finish later coming into turns. Being smooth and in control will be more rewarding than charging WFO like a madman
[*]”introduced” the double wheel tap as a way to go over certain obstacles
[*]some sections can only be done with proper body movement. Yes, I went there.[/list]
[b][size=4][url=https://mega.nz/#!NIoxHazS!4oqHJe0tUSZPuv7Cl1okKt7RFlfloFeWSGOceXEMzpM]Download SX2016RD03 on MEGA.NZ[/url][/size][/b]
[b][size=4][url=http://www.mxb-central.com/sx2016-rd03-anaheim-2/]Download SX2016RD03 on MXB CENTRAL[/url][/size][/b]
I hope you guys will enjoy this track! This will most likely be my last one until beta 5 comes out, as I will not be able (nor really willing) to devote the time it takes to make this kind of difficult track ridable and somewhat enjoyable in the near future. It just takes too much time messing around with the obstacles because the rider/bike cannot compensate a bit of spacing/shaping imperfections.
Hoh and yeah, feedback welcome 😉

today we bring to you Florida Tracks and Trails Pro Track. track is mixture of 3 different types of soil/dirt, so it makes for great racing. super fun track to shred laps on and deformation works amazing on it
. Track heightmap and finish building was done by me, finishing up and textures were done by Asdrael, and geo did camera and marshals. badstar had started on textures but we eventually come up with the idea to have Astradel do them..
Credits
Damien and Kyle Watts – Heightmap/Finish Building
Asdrael – Textures,objects placement,and all the fancy stuff
Geo – Cameras and Marshals
badstar – Starting track textures sorry we didnt use them

Hello! NewSkool here to announce round 5 of the One-One Designs SMX 250 Championship! Through 4 rounds the racing has been awesome and I’m sure it will only get better. Sign ups are open now for this round. So if you are interested in racing, Please find me on discord and I will get you into the disc so you can sign up. We accept anyone from any skill range, don’t miss out because you think you may be too good or not good enough. Come and enjoy some fun gate drops!
I’m starting to experiment with new templates and jumps. I think it worked out pretty well. However, if you notice anything that feels off please let me know so I can take the advice with me as I continue to build these tracks. I appreciate all honest and sincere thoughts!
Huge shoutout to RedRider for all the amazing advice and Assets he provides the community.

some of them are the typical from GioPanda out of his Assets thread from the forum.

All jumps got tested and work properly.
As the next release, I planned a enduro track. If anything changes you can read my “

https://mxb-mods.com/one-one-smx-round-3.title: One One Smx Round 3 Annapolis
https://mxb-mods.com/one-one-smx-round-3.creator: NewSkool
https://mxb-mods.com/one-one-smx-round-3.description:
Description
Downloads
Hello! Welcome to Round 3 of the One-One SMX Supercross Series! This week we are honoring all of the Vets out there and bringing awareness to veteran suicide. After the racing we will be posting a link on our discord for anyone who would like to donate to the cause!
Racing so far has been phenomenal and is only going to get better! If you are interested in joining this series please message me and I will send you the discord for the series! Keep in mind, I’m still a new track builder, so if you have any tips or tricks that could help me out, I’m all ears! This track runs well on the 250 and 4JUdGzvrMFDWrUUwY3toJATSeNwjn54LkCnKBPRzDuhzi5vSepHfUckJNxRL2gjkNrSqtCoRUrEDAgRwsQvVCjZbRyFTLRNyDmT1a1boZVtracks.
As you can see we have several longer rhythm sections, including a turning rhythm. Also the longer sand section through a whoop section. This track is ridable for all skill levels but is best for beginner and intermediate SX riders. Gate and pits for 22 riders.
Big shoutout to RedRider for all the track and pit objects. As well as all his tips that have helped me along the way.
Also a big shoutout to Lynds for his video series that got me into track building to begin with.
Yes the PKZ will not match the name of the track. I had already had everything built when the decision was made to change ”Location” to Annapolis.
